title: Happy Birthday, Maki-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>....just what are you trying to do? I don’t have any business in the student council room or the staff room<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>What about the library? Shall we find a book that could be used for today’s practice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Nope<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I-, is that so…. Then, the weather is great today, how about we take a walk?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….Why did they get Eli to do this, I wonder?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I guess you knew after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Today is my birthday. Eli is desperately trying to stop me from going into the clubroom. This situation has “surprise party” written all over it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, everyone has been thinking hard about it for you, okay Maki? They said that they can’t wait to see your delighted face<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….That’s why I wanted to go right away<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I guess so. If you’re looking forward to it that much, it might be a little early, but let’s go to the clubroom. Let’s see everyone’s smiles as they congratulate you♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s not like I’m looking forward to it or anything but…. Let’s go….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
